00012 
00013 /*
00014  * Generic Filter
00015  *  Filter schemes vary in their constructor parameterisation
00016  *  Filter_scheme derives a generic filter with consistent constructor interface
00017  *
00018  *  Provides specialisations for all Bayesian_filter schemes
00019  */
00020 
00021 
00022 /* Filter namespace */
00023 namespace Bayesian_filter
00024 {
00025 
00026 template <class Scheme>
00027 struct Filter_scheme : public Scheme
00028 /*
00029  * A Generic Filter Scheme
00030  *  Class template to provide a consistent constructor interface
00031  *  Default for Kalman_state_filter
00032  */
00033 {
00034     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t q_maxsize, std::size_t z_initialsize) :
00035         Kalman_state_filter (x_size), Scheme (x_size, z_initialsize)
00036     {}
00037 };
00038 
00039 
00040 // UD_filter specialisation
00041 template <>
00042 struct Filter_scheme<UD_scheme> : public UD_scheme
00043 {
00044     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t q_maxsize, std::size_t z_initialsize) :
00045         Kalman_state_filter (x_size), UD_scheme (x_size, q_maxsize, z_initialsize)
00046     {}
00047 };
00048 
00049 // Information_scheme specialisation
00050 template <>
00051 struct Filter_scheme<Information_scheme> : public Information_scheme
00052 {
00053     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t q_maxsize, std::size_t z_initialsize) :
00054         Kalman_state_filter (x_size), Information_state_filter (x_size),
00055         Information_scheme (x_size, z_initialsize)
00056     {}
00057 };
00058 
00059 // Information_root_info_scheme specialisation
00060 template <>
00061 struct Filter_scheme<Information_root_info_scheme> : public Information_root_info_scheme
00062 {
00063     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t q_maxsize, std::size_t z_initialsize) :
00064         Kalman_state_filter (x_size), Information_state_filter (x_size),
00065         Information_root_info_scheme (x_size, z_initialsize)
00066     {}
00067 };
00068 
00069 // SIR_scheme specialisation, inconsistent constructor
00070 template <>
00071 struct Filter_scheme<SIR_scheme> : public SIR_scheme
00072 {
00073     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t s_size, SIR_random& random_helper) :
00074         Sample_state_filter (x_size, s_size),
00075         SIR_scheme (x_size, s_size, random_helper)
00076     {}
00077 };
00078 
00079 // SIR_kalman_scheme specialisation, inconsistent constructor
00080 template <>
00081 struct Filter_scheme<SIR_kalman_scheme> : public SIR_kalman_scheme
00082 {
00083     Filter_scheme(std::size_t x_size, std::size_t s_size, SIR_random& random_helper) :
00084         Sample_state_filter (x_size, s_size),
00085         Kalman_state_filter (x_size),
00086         SIR_kalman_scheme (x_size, s_size, random_helper)
00087     {}
00088 };
00089 
00090 
00091 }//namespace
